intro.heading: Cultural Exchange with Complete Relocation Support
intro.description:
Au pair program providing cultural exchange and childcare solutions.

Sweden Relocators provides complete relocation services for host families and au pairs with legal support, contracts, insurance and ongoing assistance.

legalFramework.heading: Legal Framework for Au Pairs in Sweden
legalFramework.description: Au pairs regulated under the Aliens Act ensuring cultural exchange rather than employment.

requirements.title: Residence Permit
requirements.description: Non-EU citizens need Au Pair residence permit.

requirements.title: Duration
requirements.description: Valid for up to one year, renewable.

requirements.title: Tasks Allowed
requirements.description: Childcare and light household duties only.

requirements.title: Language Learning
requirements.description: Expected to attend Swedish language course.

requirements.title: Host Family Obligations
requirements.description: Provide food, accommodation and minimum allowance.

legalFramework.euNote: EU/EEA citizens have simpler process with right of residence.
